verses.verse: Then Solomon<WH8010> began<WH2490> to build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> at Jerusalem<WH3389> in mount<WH2022> Moriah<WH4179>, where the LORD appeared<WH7200> unto David<WH1732> his father<WH1>, in the place<WH4725> that David<WH1732> had prepared<WH3559> in the threshingfloor<WH1637> of Ornan<WH771> the Jebusite<WH2983>. where: or, which was seen of David his father
And he began<WH2490> to build<WH1129> in the second<WH8145> day of the second<WH8145> month<WH2320>, in the fourth<WH702> year<WH8141> of his reign<WH4438>.

Now these are the things wherein Solomon<WH8010> was instructed<WH3245> for the building<WH1129> of the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>. The length<WH753> by cubits<WH520> after the first<WH7223> measure<WH4060> was threescore<WH8346> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>. instructed: Heb. founded

And the porch<WH197> that was in the front<WH6440> of the house, the length<WH753> of it was according to the breadth<WH7341> of the house<WH1004>, twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>, and the height<WH1363> was an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242>: and he overlaid<WH6823> it within<WH6441> with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>.

And the greater<WH1419> house<WH1004> he cieled<WH2645> with fir<WH1265> tree<WH6086>, which he overlaid<WH2645> with fine<WH2896> gold<WH2091>, and set<WH5927> thereon palm trees<WH8561> and chains<WH8333>.
And he garnished<WH6823> the house<WH1004> with precious<WH3368> stones<WH68> for beauty<WH8597>: and the gold<WH2091> was gold<WH2091> of Parvaim<WH6516>. garnished: Heb. covered

He overlaid<WH2645> also the house<WH1004>, the beams<WH6982>, the posts<WH5592>, and the walls<WH7023> thereof, and the doors<WH1817> thereof, with gold<WH2091>; and graved<WH6605> cherubims<WH3742> on the walls<WH7023>.

And he made<WH6213> the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> house<WH1004>, the length<WH753> whereof was according to<WH6440> the breadth<WH7341> of the house<WH1004>, twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> thereof twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>: and he overlaid<WH2645> it with fine<WH2896> gold<WH2091>, amounting to six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> talents<WH3603>.
And the weight<WH4948> of the nails<WH4548> was fifty<WH2572> shekels<WH8255> of gold<WH2091>. And he overlaid<WH2645> the upper chambers<WH5944> with gold<WH2091>.

And in the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> house<WH1004> he made<WH6213> two<WH8147> cherubims<WH3742> of image<WH6816> work<WH4639>, and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>. image: or, (as some think) of moveable work

And the wings<WH3671> of the cherubims<WH3742> were twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> long<WH753>: one<WH259> wing<WH3671> of the one cherub was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520>, reaching<WH5060> to the wall<WH7023> of the house<WH1004>: and the other<WH312> wing<WH3671> was likewise five<WH2568> cubits<WH520>, reaching<WH5060> to the wing<WH3671> of the other<WH312> cherub<WH3742>.

And one wing<WH3671> of the other<WH259> cherub<WH3742> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520>, reaching<WH5060> to the wall<WH7023> of the house<WH1004>: and the other<WH312> wing<WH3671> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> also, joining<WH1695> to the wing<WH3671> of the other<WH312> cherub<WH3742>.

The wings<WH3671> of these cherubims<WH3742> spread themselves forth<WH6566> twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>: and they stood<WH5975> on their feet<WH7272>, and their faces<WH6440> were inward<WH1004>. inward: or, toward the house
And he made<WH6213> the vail<WH6532> of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and crimson<WH3758>, and fine linen<WH948>, and wrought<WH5927> cherubims<WH3742> thereon. wrought: Heb. caused to ascend

Also he made<WH6213> before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> two<WH8147> pillars<WH5982> of thirty<WH7970> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> high<WH753>, and the chapiter<WH6858> that was on the top<WH7218> of each of them was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520>. high: Heb. long

And he made<WH6213> chains<WH8333>, as in the oracle<WH1687>, and put<WH5414> them on the heads<WH7218> of the pillars<WH5982>; and made<WH6213> an hundred<WH3967> pomegranates<WH7416>, and put<WH5414> them on the chains<WH8333>.

And he reared up<WH6965> the pillars<WH5982> before<WH6440> the temple<WH1964>, one<WH259> on the right hand<WH3225>, and the other<WH259> on the left<WH8040>; and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of that on the right hand<WH3233> <WH3227> Jachin<WH3199>, and the name<WH8034> of that on the left<WH8042> Boaz<WH1162>. Jachin: that is, He shall establish Boaz: that is, In it is strength
